title: CPass
description: A password manager I made for personal use with 256 bit encryption, Memory encryption, Encrypted master password for encryption and great design

title: WinCustom
description: Customise your windows experience with an amazing User Interface! Toggle settings to customise Context Menus, Cortana, Control Panel, Start Menu and Taskbar

title: Contact Form
description: A back end PHP contact form script with non-capcha spam detection, IP, operation system and browser logging.

title: Greed Fear Index
description: A simple email alert for market sentiment based on FGI (Fear Greed Index).
